Detailed Description

Database relation of os_pci_module.cc.

Date:
Wed Jul 21 17:28:52 2010

Store Operating System information in database, and add it's 'modules.pcimap' list. If the given OS exists just update it's 'modules.pcimap' list.

Function Documentation

int store_pci_map ( vector< PciDevice > &  pci_map_list,
OsInfo &  osInfo 
)

Store/Update OS-pcimap_list in database.

Store OS along with it's 'modules.pcimap' list in database, or just update the 'modules.pcimap' list if the given OS exists.

Parameters:
pci_map_list List of devices in 'modules.pcimap' as std::vector.
osInfo Object holding the OS information.
Returns:
Success status of store/update.
  • 0 -> (SUCCESS)
  • 1 -> (FAIL)
